Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.webdrivers

Class WindowList

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.webdrivers.WindowList
public class WindowList extends Object
Keeps track of all windows a driver has open and which one the user is currently on.
Author:
dougnoel@gmail.com

    • windowHandles

      private List<String> windowHandles

      private int currentWindow

    • driver

      private org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver

  • Constructor Details

    • WindowList

      public WindowList(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
      When a WindowList is created, you must pass it a reference to the driver that created it. This driver is stored and the list of windows is created and then maintained for it. Since this object is destroyed when the driver is destroyed, it should never have a stale reference to a driver.
      Parameters:
      driver - WebDriver the containing driver object that is related to this driver object

  • Method Details

    • addNewWindows

      private int addNewWindows()
      Search the driver for all windows and add any that don't exist.
      Returns:
      int Returns the number of added windows

    • markCurrentWindow

      private void markCurrentWindow()
      Track the current window.

    • pruneClosedWindows

      private int pruneClosedWindows()
      If any windows have been closed, remove them from our list.
      Returns:
      int Returns the number of pruned windows

    • getHandleFromTitle

      private String getHandleFromTitle(String title)
      Search the available window handles to find a window with the expected title. Searches until default timeout.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the window to get the handle of
      Returns:
      the handle of the window that has the title expected

    • goToNewWindow

      protected void goToNewWindow()
      Wait for a new window to be added, and moves the driver to the last window added.

    • closeCurrentWindow

      protected void closeCurrentWindow()
      Closes the current window and moves the driver to the previous window. If no previous window exists, we call close to clean up.

    • goToNextWindow

      protected void goToNextWindow()
      Moves the driver to the next window.

    • goToPreviousWindow

      protected void goToPreviousWindow()
      Moves the driver to the previous window.

    • goToLastWindow

      protected void goToLastWindow()
      Moves the driver to the last window in our list, which is presumably the most recent one created.

    • goToTitledWindow

      protected void goToTitledWindow(String title)
      Switches to the window whose title matches the string passed
      Parameters:
      title - String the title of the window to go to

    • clear

      protected void clear()
      Empty out the list of windows.

    • doesWindowExist

      protected boolean doesWindowExist(String title)
      Checks if a window of the passed title exists
      Parameters:
      title - String the title of the window to check for
      Returns:
      true if a window is found that has the title passed as the string
